alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Harnett; Lee; Moore; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 6:11PM EDT until August 15 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Moore County in central North Carolina... Harnett County in central North Carolina... Lee County in central North Carolina... Southwestern Wake County in central North Carolina... Southeastern Chatham County in central North Carolina... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 611 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Carthage, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sanford, Lillington, Fuquay-Varina, Angier, Erwin, Broadway, Cameron, Lemon Springs, Gum Springs and Raven Rock State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
